StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_O.cerSelec.onBoardQIResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) ) AS BEGIN --Gather the Test Scores for Candidates assigned to the Board SELECT MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ,MC.GENDER_CODE ,OC.CONTRACT_ID ,OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID ,B.BOARD_ID ,NULL AS 'SAT' ,NULL AS 'ACT' ,PFT1.PFT_SCORE ,OC.CONTRACT_GPA ,CA.AFQT_SCORE INTO #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PFT PFT1 ON N.NWA_ID = PFT1.NWA_ID AND PFT_ID = (SELECT MAX(PFT_ID) FROM PFT PFT2 WHERE PFT2.NWA_ID = PFT1.NWA_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(ASVAB_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA2 WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1
--SAT UPDATE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS SET SAT = CPE.EXAM_SCORE FROM #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'S' --ACT UPDATE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS SET ACT = CPE.EXAM_SCORE FROM #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'T'
--Return the averages SELECT AVG(STAT.SAT) AS 'OVERALL_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(STAT.ACT) AS 'OVERALL_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(STAT.PFT_SCORE) AS 'OVERALL_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(STAT.CONTRACT_GPA) AS 'OVERALL_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(STAT.AFQT_SCORE) AS 'OVERALL_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_AFQT' FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 --Cleanup DROP TABLE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS
END
